subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong choked up as he spoke of revealing his doping to his son, but other answers during the second part of his interview with Oprah Winfrey failed to persuade officials.
snippet: Lance Armstrong choked up as he spoke of revealing his doping to his son, but other answers during the second part of his interview with Oprah Winfrey failed to persuade officials.
